title: WTF IS HAPPENING?! || One Piece Episode 453 & 454 REACTION + REVIEW
author: Unknown Creator
description: A reaction and review video covering One Piece episodes 453 and 454, following the Straw Hats' separation storylines including Nami on Weatheria and Franky on Karakuri Island.

title: Bon Clay's Sacrifice | One Piece REACTION - Episode 451, 452, & 453
author: BoomSentai
description: A reaction video covering episodes 451-453, including Bon Clay's sacrifice in Impel Down and the beginning of the Straw Hat's Separation Serial with Nami and Franky's stories.

title: ONE PIECE EPISODE 453 REACTION!!!
author: According to Lucky
description: A Patreon-exclusive reaction to One Piece episode 453, covering the beginning of the Straw Hat's Separation Serial.

title: NAMI ABOUT TO LVL UP | One Piece Episode 453 Reaction
author: Unknown Creator
description: A reaction video focused on Nami's arrival on Weatheria and her introduction to weather science, recognizing the potential for her character growth.

title: One Piece Ep 453+454 Full Reactions!
author: Nerdy Nightly
description: Full reaction coverage of One Piece episodes 453 and 454, showing the Straw Hats' whereabouts after their separation.

title: One Piece: What Vegapunk's Introduction Could Mean for Franky
author: GameRant
description: An article analyzing the connection between Franky's time on Karakuri Island, his discovery of Vegapunk's laboratory, and what Vegapunk's eventual introduction in the series could mean for Franky's character.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains information about Vegapunk's eventual introduction and Franky's post-timeskip abilities

title: 453-456: The Friends' Whereabouts
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A blog post reviewing episodes 453-456 together, discussing the Straw Hats' separation storylines and noting that while fans appreciated seeing what the crew was up to, weekly viewers at the time would have been frustrated by a month of these episodes.
